entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:25 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: W 28 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
